title: How Gillette Venus Naked Skin® designed by Braun Intense Pulsed Light Works
description:
Gillette Venus Naked Skin® designed by Braun is an intense pulsed light hair removal system that has been clinically tested for at-home use. In other words, you'll get professionally derived intense pulsed light technology at a fraction of the cost.  

Here's how it works: Intense Pulsed Light (or IPL) works its magic beneath the skin's surface by targeting the melanin in dark hair, helping to break the cycle of hair re-growth. With continued, periodic use, the light energy helps prevent unwanted hair from reaching the skin's surface.

Here's how it works: Intense Pulsed Light (or IPL) works its magic beneath the skin's surface by targeting the melanin in dark hair, helping to break the cycle of hair re-growth. With continued, periodic use, the light energy helps prevent unwanted hair from reaching the skin's surface.
asset.author: Braun

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Indulge yourself with continuously smooth skin. Introducing Gillette Venus Naked Skin designed by Braun with especially formulated V activating gel, clinically and dermatologist tested. Here's how it works. Venus naked skin uses pulse light technology to help break the cycle of hair regrowth. V activating gel enables the light to travel seamlessly to the hair. Naked Skin uses square wave technology. Square wave technology consistently delivers just the right level of energy to treat unwanted hairs. With continued periodic use, it helps put the hair follicles to sleep to prevent unwanted hair from reaching the surface. Venus Naked Skin, designed by Braun.
